    • getNextSpaceID

      public int getNextSpaceID(int spaceID)
      Obtain the ID of the space that occurs 1 ahead of the specified input space ID. Alternatively may return a valid space ID for an input > 39.
      Parameters:
      spaceID - The space ID to be checked.
      Returns:
      The next space ID.

    • getDistance

      public int getDistance(int spaceA, int spaceB)
      Obtain the distance, in number of spaces, between any two space IDs.
      Parameters:
      spaceA - The origin space ID.
      spaceB - The destination space ID.
      Returns:
      The number of spaces between A and B. Always a positive integer.

    • getSpacesByColorGroup

      public ArrayList<Color> getSpacesByColorGroup(Color.ColorGroupKeys inputColorGroup)
      Return all spaces which match the color group given as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      inputColorGroup - The color group to return all Color spaces belonging to.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Color spaces, where all elements belong to the color group specified as a parameter.

    • getSpacesByOwnerID

      public ArrayList<Property> getSpacesByOwnerID(int ownerID)
      Return all properties whose ownerID matches the given parameter.
      Parameters:
      ownerID - The ID of the player whose properties will be returned.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Property objects.

      public void updatePropertyOwnershipRelationships()
      Call all methods that evaluate the state of Properties.
